author: Leigh Morgan
title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, and more: The top 15 cryptocurrencies everyone should know
description: Cryptocurrency is a growing sector in finance, influencing how we approach financial systems and investment opportunities. Each digital asset in the market has its own features and potential. But with thousands of cryptocurrencies in existence, knowing which …
content:
As the original digital payment token introduced to the public in 2008, Bitcoin is used by investors and consumers for value exchange trading digital assets for other assets and purchases.
